mapper.insert: insert into comment_book_audio(bookAudioId, content, openid) value (#{comment.bookAudioId}, #{comment.content}, #{comment.openid});
insert into comment_short_audio(shortAudioId, content, openid) value (#{comment.bookAudioId}, #{comment.content}, #{comment.openid});
mapper.select: select cba.id, cba.content, count(tcba.openid) as thumb, ifnull((select 1 from thumb_comment_book_audio t where t.openid = #{openid} and t.commentBookAudioId = cba.id limit 1), 0) as thumbed, cba.commentTime, u.gender, u.avatarUrl, u.name from comment_book_audio cba left join user u on cba.openid = u.openid left join thumb_comment_book_audio tcba on cba.id = tcba.commentBookAudioId where bookAudioId = #{id} group by cba.id;

select csa.id, csa.content, count(tcsa.openid) as thumb, ifnull((select 1 from thumb_comment_short_audio t where t.openid = #{openid} and t.commentShortAudioId = csa.id limit 1), 0) as thumbed, csa.commentTime, u.gender, u.avatarUrl, u.name from comment_short_audio csa left join user u on csa.openid = u.openid left join thumb_comment_short_audio tcsa on csa.id = tcsa.commentShortAudioId where shortAudioId = #{id} group by csa.id;

select cba.id, cba.content, cba.commentTime, cba.approved, cba.checked, u.gender, u.avatarUrl, u.name as name, b.name as parentName from comment_book_audio cba left join user u on cba.openid = u.openid left join thumb_comment_book_audio tcba on cba.id = tcba.commentBookAudioId left join book_audio ba on cba.bookAudioId = ba.id left join book b on ba.bookId = b.id

select csa.id, csa.content, csa.commentTime, csa.approved, csa.checked, u.gender, u.avatarUrl, u.name, sa.actName as parentName from comment_short_audio csa left join user u on csa.openid = u.openid left join thumb_comment_short_audio tcsa on csa.id = tcsa.commentShortAudioId left join short_audio sa on csa.shortAudioId = sa.id
